Join the PureMVC Developers Group on Linked In and connect with a community of talented professionals who use PureMVC.

The PureMVC Architect's Lounge is a the heart of the PureMVC community.

The forums have nearly 2000 members, all helping to push forward the best practices with rich discussions about real-world issues in RIA development with PureMVC.

Unfortunately, as PureMVC became more popular, the forums also became a magnet for spammers. The forums are open to everyone, but in order to post, you must have an account on Linked In
